## Description {#details}

Recipe to generate a scalar PHI.

Used to generate code for recipes that produce scalar header phis, including <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpcanonicalivphirecipe">VPCanonicalIVPHIRecipe</a> and <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpevlbasedivphirecipe">VPEVLBasedIVPHIRecipe</a>.

Definition at line 2267 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplan-h">VPlan.h</a>.
